full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHOS RGYAL NANG SGRUB KYI GTOR 'BUL MDOR BSDUS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @001A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI DGA' LDAN LHA BRGYA MA'I MJUG TU CHOS RGYAL LA GTOR MA 'BUL BA 'DI NI, BYANG PHYOGS 'GRO BA'I 'DREN PA MGON PO RDO RJE 'CHANG RIN PO CHE BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED ^DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG 'JIGS MED RDO RJE DPAL BZANG PO'I ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOS LEN PA SMYON LAS BLUN PO THA SHAL ^BLO MCHOG GIS SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
